casebody.data:
Charlie PRYOR and wife Rita Pryor, Plaintiffs,
v.
CITY OF RALEIGH, County of Wake, Andrew Fettes, individually and his official capacity as an employee of Wake County, Jesus Rios, individually and his official capacity as an employee of the City of Raleigh, Defendants. No. COA15-1403. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 7, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
